abilities.name: Incendiary
abilities.description: Launches an incendiary grenade that deploys a damaging field of fire.

abilities.name: Stim Beacon
abilities.description: Deploys a beacon that gives all nearby players a rapid-fire buff.

abilities.name: Sky Smoke
abilities.description: Deploys a tactical map allowing Brimstone to call in orbital smokescreens that obscure vision.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.description: Calls in a powerful orbital strike that deals high damage over time in a large area.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.description: Throws a projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud on impact.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.description: Propels Jett high into the air.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Dashes Jett a short distance in the direction she is moving.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: Equips Jett with a set of highly accurate throwing knives that deal moderate damage and reset on kills.

abilities.name: Shock Bolt
abilities.description: Fires an explosive bolt that emits a damaging pulse of static energy upon impact.

abilities.name: Owl Drone
abilities.description: Deploys a drone that can fire a dart to reveal the location of anyone hit.

abilities.name: Recon Bolt
abilities.description: Fires a bolt that deploys a sonar emitter, revealing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Hunter's Fury
abilities.description: Fires up to three long-range energy blasts that can pierce walls and reveal enemies.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.description: Throws a fireball that explodes after a delay or upon impact, creating a zone of fire that damages enemies and heals Phoenix.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Creates a wall of fire that blocks vision and damages anyone passing through it.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.description: Throws a flashbang that curves around corners, blinding all who see it.

abilities.name: Run It Back
abilities.description: Marks Phoenix's current location. If he dies during the ability's duration, or when the ability's duration expires, he is reborn at the marked location with full health.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.description: Places a solid wall that can be rotated before casting.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.description: Casts a radiant orb that slows down anyone who steps on it.

abilities.name: Healing Orb
abilities.description: Heals a teammate or self over a few seconds.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.description: Revives a dead teammate with full health.

abilities.name: Snake Bite
abilities.description: Launches a projectile that explodes into a pool of acid, dealing damage to anyone within it.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.description: Throws a gas emitter that you can reactivate to create a toxic smoke cloud at the cost of fuel.

abilities.name: Toxic Screen
abilities.description: Deploys a line of gas emitters that can be reactivated to create a tall wall of toxic gas.

abilities.name: Viper's Pit
abilities.description: Creates a large cloud of toxic gas that reduces the vision range and max health of players inside it.

abilities.name: Boom Bot
abilities.description: Deploys a bot that travels in a straight line and explodes upon detecting enemies.

abilities.name: Blast Pack
abilities.description: Throws a satchel charge that can be detonated, dealing damage and knocking back anything hit.

abilities.name: Paint Shells
abilities.description: Throws a cluster grenade that explodes into smaller grenades upon impact.

abilities.name: Showstopper
abilities.description: Fires a rocket launcher that deals massive damage in a large area.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.description: Casts an orb that nearsights all enemies who look at it.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Heals Reyna after securing a kill, using Soul Orbs dropped by slain enemies.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.description: Uses a Soul Orb to become intangible and avoid damage for a short time.

abilities.name: Empress
abilities.description: Enters a heightened state of bloodlust, increasing firing speed and automatically using Devour on kills.

abilities.name: Nanoswarm
abilities.description: Deploys a grenade that, when activated, swarms an area with damaging nanobots.

abilities.name: Alarmbot
abilities.description: Deploys a bot that hunts down enemies and applies a debuff that causes them to take more damage.

abilities.name: Turret
abilities.description: Deploys a turret that fires at enemies in a 180-degree cone.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.description: Deploys a device that emits a pulse after a long wind-up, detaining all enemies caught in its radius.

abilities.name: Trapwire
abilities.description: Deploys a tripwire between two walls that tethers and reveals enemies who trigger it.

abilities.name: Cyber Cage
abilities.description: Throws a device that creates a zone which blocks vision and slows enemies who pass through it.

abilities.name: Spycam
abilities.description: Deploys a camera that can be used to remotely view the area and fire tracking darts at enemies.

abilities.name: Neural Theft
abilities.description: After killing an enemy, Cypher can use their corpse to reveal the location of all remaining enemies.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.description: Allows Omen to teleport to a nearby location.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: Sends out an ethereal shadow in a straight line, near-sighting, deafening, and slowing anyone it touches.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.description: Casts a long-lasting smoke that can be steered while in the air.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.description: Allows Omen to teleport anywhere on the map. If he dies during the teleport, he will return to his original location.
